verses.name: Joel 3:10
verses.text: Beat your plowshares into swords, and your pruninghooks into spears: let the weak say, I am strong.

verses.name: Joel 3:11
verses.text: Assemble yourselves, and come, all ye heathen, and gather yourselves together round about: thither cause thy mighty ones to come down, O Lord.

verses.name: Joel 3:12
verses.text: Let the heathen be wakened, and come up to the valley of Jehoshaphat: for there will I sit to judge all the heathen round about.

verses.name: Joel 3:13
verses.text: Put ye in the sickle, for the harvest is ripe: come, get you down; for the press is full, the fats overflow; for their wickedness is great.
